name: Prowings Training (Pty) Ltd
about: Prowings Training (Pty) Ltd is a leading provider of high-quality drone pilot training, accredited by the South African and Zambian Civil Aviation Authorities. We offer comprehensive Remote Pilot Certificate (RPC) training, exposing learners to various industries to enhance their work readiness. Our training includes both on-site and online courses, ensuring flexibility and convenience. Our programs focus on legal compliance, professional opportunities, advanced skills, safety, and reliability. By choosing Prowings Training, you ensure you meet all regulatory requirements and gain the skills necessary for successful and safe drone operations in industries such as aerial photography, surveying, and environmental monitoring. We are committed to preparing you for a career in the expanding drone industry.
services:
["Quality Assurance Course
Radio Telephony (General)
RPC (A)
RPC (MR)
